candidates.name: Zane Cozens
candidates.why_elect: I am a long-time Taupō District resident, a known advocate for encouraging community prosperity. An experienced councillor, a successful businessman, a relationship builder. I am a people-person and a person of the people. A challenger, a goal setter. Fit, hardworking, I will lead a proud team that get things done.
candidates.why_stand: Change. We need to change the way we engage with and value our people and we must change our debt situation—manage our finances better. We need to change the way we treat our environment. Let's discover our real districts potential—together.

candidates.name: Kim Eyles
candidates.why_elect: Because I am interested in hearing from everybody, and because I bring fresh thinking.
candidates.why_stand: Because I believe that I have innovative ideas to share and because I love Taupō and want to make it a better place.

candidates.name: David Trewavas
candidates.why_elect: I have the experience, been in Taupō nearly 40 years, governance is a passion. I will be the mayor for all.
candidates.why_stand: It has been a absolute honour and privilege to be the mayor of Taupō District for the last six years. We must continue on the growth path with clear and concise leadership in harmony with the environment. Our industries of tourism, agriculture, geothermal and forestry fully supported.
